result.title: Minutes on workshop, meeting and event outcome (v1) - T4.3
result.description: This deliverable (v1) reports the outcome of the expert meetings, which will be organized for different industry sectors of applications, in different regions in Europe. The topics of the workshop and the structure will be defined based on the results from the preliminary modelling-at-industry survey and using the most suitable translation methodology. Minutes of these meetings will be prepared and reported in this deliverable.
